DefaultReaderConfiguration.preQueryCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AgentEvent WHERE EventType IN (0,1,5,6,7,8,9,10) AND InsertDate >= ?
DefaultReaderConfiguration.queryString: SELECT ae.InsertDate, ae.ScanDate, ae.EventType, etl.TypeDesc, ae.MachineName, ae.IP, ae.OS, ae.TheDomain, ae.PolicyName, ae.AgentVersion, ae.AgentGuid, ae.ThreatVersion AS DefinitionVersion, ape.UserName, apml.MonitorName, apmtl.MonitorTypeDescription, apkal.KnownAsDescription, apetl.EventTypeName, apdl.DispositionDescription, apal.AuthorityDescription, ape.ThreatID AS APThreatID, ape.Executable, ape.EventXML, tsl.ThreatSeverityDesc, tl.ThreatName, tl.ThreatCategory, tl.ThreatDesc, al.ActionDesc, ttl.TraceTypeDesc, tr.Data, eave.AttachmentName, eaval.Description AS EmailAVDesc, eave.ThreatID AS EmailAVThreatID, sm.ThreatSeverity, ssl.Description AS SubSystem, ssetl.Description AS SystemEventType, sm.Description AS SysMessageDesc, sm.MoreInfo FROM AgentEvent ae INNER JOIN EventTypeLookup etl ON etl.EventType = ae.EventType LEFT JOIN APEvent ape ON ae.EventType = 7 AND ape.ScanDate = ae.ScanDate AND ape.AgentGuid = ae.AgentGuid LEFT JOIN APDispositionLookup apdl ON ae.EventType = 7 AND apdl.DispositionID = ape.DispositionID LEFT JOIN APEventTypeLookup apetl ON ae.EventType = 7 AND apetl.APEventTypeID = ape.APEventTypeID LEFT JOIN APMonitorLookup apml ON ae.EventType = 7 AND apml.APMonitorID = ape.APMonitorID LEFT JOIN APMonitorTypeLookup apmtl ON ae.EventType = 7 AND apmtl.MonitorTypeID = ape.MonitorTypeID LEFT JOIN APKnownAsLookup apkal ON ae.EventType = 7 AND apkal.KnownAsID = ape.KnownAsID LEFT JOIN APAuthorityLookup apal ON ae.EventType = 7 AND apal.AuthorityID = ape.AuthorityID LEFT JOIN Scan s ON ae.EventType IN (0,1,9) AND s.ScanDate = ae.ScanDate AND s.AgentGuid = ae.AgentGuid LEFT JOIN Threat th ON ae.EventType IN (0,1,9) AND th.ScanDate = s.ScanDate AND th.AgentGuid = s.AgentGuid LEFT JOIN ThreatLookup tl ON ae.EventType IN (0,1,9) AND tl.ThreatID = th.ThreatID LEFT JOIN ActionLookup al ON ae.EventType IN (0,1,9) AND al.ActionID = th.ActionID LEFT JOIN ThreatSeverityLookup tsl ON ae.EventType IN (0,1,9) AND tsl.ThreatSeverity= tl.ThreatSeverity LEFT JOIN TraceTypeLookup ttl LEFT JOIN Trace tr ON tr.TraceType= ttl.TraceType ON tr.ThreatID= th.ThreatID AND tr.AgentGuid= th.AgentGuid AND tr.ScanDate= th.ScanDate AND ae.EventType IN (0,1,9) LEFT JOIN EmailAVEvent eave ON ae.EventType= 8 AND eave.ScanDate= ae.ScanDate AND eave.AgentGuid= ae.AgentGuid LEFT JOIN EmailAVActionLookup eaval ON ae.EventType= 8 AND eaval.ActionID= eave.ActionID LEFT JOIN SystemMessage sm ON ae.EventType= 10 AND sm.AgentGuid= ae.AgentGuid AND sm.ScanDate= ae.ScanDate LEFT JOIN SubSystemLookup ssl ON ae.EventType = 10 AND ssl.SubSystemID = sm.SubSystemID LEFT JOIN SubSystemEventTypeLookup ssetl ON ae.EventType = 10 AND ssetl.SubSystemEventTypeID = sm.SubSystemEventTypeID WHERE ae.EventType IN (0,1,5,6,7,8,9,10) AND ae.InsertDate >= ? ORDER BY ae.InsertDate

string.toolTipText: Instance name to read from (if the database is on an instance)
Date and time in milliseconds since epoch
Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

FastPattern.description: 1, VirusAttack: Scanned Events (has 10 tabs after common fields and 8 at the eol)
2, VirusAttack: Active Protection Event, no virus name (15 tabs at eol)
3, VirusAttack: Active Protection Event (virus name required for this alert - $21)
4, ServiceWarning: System Events, Active Protection could not be enabled
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*Active Protection could not be enabled

FastPattern.description: 5, VirusAttack: Vipre was "Unable to convert" quarantine event virus message - (convert here parsing data for info - may need to modify later for diff event types)
6, ServiceWarning: System Events, Unable to resolve IP for server
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*Unable to resolve IP for server

FastFormatter.condition: Unable to resolve IP for server (\S+) .*
FastFormatter.format: Unable to resolve IP for server "$18"

FastPattern.description: 7, ServiceWarning: System Events, WMI Push to agent box Failed with an exception
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*WMI Push to agent box \S+ Failed with an exception

FastFormatter.condition: WMI Push to agent box (\S+) Failed with an exception .*
FastFormatter.format: WMI Push to "$18" Failed with an exception

FastPattern.description: 8, ServiceWarning: System Events, Cannot stop service on computer
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*Cannot stop \S+ service on computer

FastPattern.description: 9, ServiceWarning: System Events, Service was not found on computer
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*Service \S+ was not found on computer

FastFormatter.condition: Service (\S+) was not found on computer '(\S+)'.*
FastFormatter.format: Service "$18" was not found on computer "$19"

FastPattern.description: 10, ServiceWarning: System Events, Win32.Push: Failed to start CounterSpyAgent service on
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*Win32.Push: Failed to start CounterSpyAgent service on

FastFormatter.condition: Win32.Push: Failed to start CounterSpyAgent service on '(\S+)'.*
FastFormatter.format: Win32.Push: Failed to start CounterSpyAgent service on "$18"

FastPattern.description: 11, ServiceWarning: System Events, Unable to make WMI Connection to
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*Unable to make WMI Connection to

FastFormatter.condition: Unable to make WMI Connection to (\S+).*
FastFormatter.format: Unable to make WMI Connection to "$18"

FastPattern.description: 12, ServiceWarning: System Events, WNetAddConnection - Network Path Not Found
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*WNetAddConnection returncode=\w+ - Network Path Not Found

FastPattern.description: 13, ServiceWarning: System Events, AgentGuid sent in a report but doesn't exist in catalog
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*AgentGuid \S+ sent in a report file on [^,]+, but does not exist in the catalog

FastFormatter.condition: AgentGuid (\S+) sent in a report file on [^,]+, but does not exist in the catalog .*
FastFormatter.format: AgentGuid "$18" sent report file, but does not exist in the catalog

FastFormatter.condition: AgentGuid \S+ sent in a report file on ([^,]+), but does not exist in the catalog .*

FastPattern.description: 14, ServiceInfo: System Events, Error number 1717 enumerating domains, continuing without list
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*Error number 1717 enumerating domains, continuing without list

FastPattern.description: 15, ServiceWarning: System Events, AgentGuid sent in a report but doesn't exist in catalog
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*Download of threat definitions failed due to internet connection problems

FastField.defaultValue: Download of threat definitions failed due to internet connection problems

FastFormatter.format: Download of threat definitions failed for "$18"

FastField.defaultValue: Download of threat definitions failed due to internet connection problems

FastPattern.description: 16, ServiceWarning: System Events, File Processing Failed
17, ServiceWarning: System Events, Unable to establish Internet connectivity
FastPattern.pattern: System Message.*ERROR! Unable to establish Internet connectivity

FastPattern.description: Null Alert: Scans containing no detections
NullAlert: Allowed Processes
NullAlert: Exceptions
Black Hole
